symptoms.name: Fever

symptoms.pattern: Occurred with headache and general condition deterioration

symptoms.pattern: Occurred with headache and general condition deterioration

symptoms.pattern: Occurred with headache and general condition deterioration

symptoms.pattern: Developed two weeks after initial symptoms

symptoms.pattern: Developed two weeks after initial symptoms

symptoms.pattern: Developed two weeks after initial symptoms

symptoms.name: Jaundice
symptoms.pattern: Occurred with fever and weight loss

symptoms.name: Skin lesions
symptoms.pattern: Warty plaques over face and trunk

physical_findings: Febrile and conscious patient, hemodynamically stable
risk_factors: Immunocompromised state (e.g., due to HIV, immunosuppressive medications, organ transplant)

required: Positive culture from two distinct sites (e.g., blood, CSF, sputum)
supportive: Positive cryptococcal antigen test in serum and/or CSF
Encapsulated yeasts on India ink staining of CSF and/or sputum
Characteristic imaging findings (e.g., pulmonary nodules, cavitation, lymphadenopathy)

differential_diagnoses: Other fungal infections (e.g., candidiasis, histoplasmosis, coccidioidomycosis, Paracoccidioidomycosis)
